name: Wedding Rings - Bling Prom Queen
description:
+++ 48-hour discount! 100% FREE! Catch that ring! +++

” Gorgeous Graphics”
” Addictive Game play”
” Exciting Levels”
___________________________________

Looking for an exciting game with lots of fun? Wedding Rings might just be your cup of tea! With realistic graphics, immersive music and easy controls, Wedding Rings is an exciting iPad game suitable for all ages.

This Game play is irresistible addicting, extremely simple and instance fun. Simply adjust the angle and height of the ring to the right orientation and toss the wedding rings effectively into the finger.
Earn the maximum points and compete with your friends for the highest score. Good Luck!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Excellent, outstanding flick control
Beautiful graphics
Immersive music and sound effect
Very addicting
Different Game levels
